mapper.select: SELECT user_id, password, name, phone, email, register_time, admin_type, managed_cinema_id FROM user ORDER BY register_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (password, name, phone, email, register_time, admin_type, managed_cinema_id) VALUES (#{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{registerTime}, #{adminType}, #{managedCinemaId})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET password = #{password}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, admin_type = #{adminType}, managed_cinema_id = #{managedCinemaId} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
